column4: I am getting prompted when I try to add/remove programs or update programs
when I went to the user topic there was no password entered in any field, but to change it, it asked for a password -.-
I've only used windows before but I saw some cool math/science apps and was really looking forward to trying them out
Well, I have 2 main windows PCs and my wife has a windows PC as well, but I'd heard linux was a better choice for a lot of things
I tried the blank password already :(
along with every password I've ever had in my entire life
restart and boot to the recovery console and select reset password
follow that link. get to the GRUB menu. you might have to press esc to get it.
follow the video at the end of this: http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/resetpassword
